item.title: Real Racing 3 update brings split screen racing to Apple TV
item.description:
Real Racing 3 update brings split screen racing to Apple TV

Popular free-to-play iOS racing game Real Racing 3 has received an update which includes a new "Daytona Experience" race pack and enhanced integration with Apple TV. The Daytona Experience features iconic 700-horsepower NASCAR Spring Cup Series cars and the opportunity to take part in Daytona 500, the most prestigious race in the NASCAR calendar.
